quote: Listings with video get about a 400% increase in engagement than those without.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the significant impact of video marketing on property engagement.
suggested_hook: Want to boost your listing's engagement by 400%? Here's how!

quote: To have professional grade marketing material at your fingertips within five to 10 minutes is pretty unheard of.
why_clipworthy: Demonstrates the power and speed of AI in real estate marketing.
suggested_hook: Imagine getting professional marketing materials in just minutes. Here's the future of real estate marketing!
